title: Estructura_de_Datos_para_Modelación_de_Cultivos_con_agroclimR
text: Este documento describe la estructura del libro de Excel utilizado para recolectar y organizar datos con fines de modelación y simulación de cultivos. continuación, se detalla la información de cada hoja y las variables que contiene el libro de trabajo de agroclimR.

previous_headings: Estructura del Libro de Excel y Descripción de Variables
what: AGRO - Datos Generales del Ensayo Experimental
title: Estructura_de_Datos_para_Modelación_de_Cultivos_con_agroclimR

what: A R-Toolkit for Agroclimatic Data Management and Crop Model File Creation
title: A R-Toolkit for Agroclimatic Data Management and Crop Model File Creation
text: agroclimR package designed streamline management, manipulation, generation process-based model files systems like DSSAT v 4.8, ORYZA v3.0, Aquacrop v6.0.

title: A R-Toolkit for Agroclimatic Data Management and Crop Model File Creation
text: can install development version agroclimR GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("jrodriguez88/agroclimR")

title: A R-Toolkit for Agroclimatic Data Management and Crop Model File Creation
text: basic example shows create crop model weather file agroclimR: basic example shows create crop model Soil file agroclimR:
code: library(agroclimR)  path = "." id_name = "TEST" wth_data = weather lat = 3.8 lon = -76.5 elev = 650  ## basic example code to create ORYZA weather file  write_wth_oryza(path, id_name, wth_data, lat, lon, elev) #> Early morning vapor pressure (VP; kPa) derived from relative humidity data #> Wind Speed is not Available - Set as NA: -99 #> [1] TRUE  ## basic example code to create DSSAT weather file write_wth_dssat(path, id_name, wth_data, lat, lon, elev) #> [1] TRUE   ## basic example code to create AquaCrop weather file   write_wth_aquacrop(path, id_name, wth_data, lat, lon, elev) #> Wind Speed = 2m/s was used #> Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) Method: FAO Penman-Monteith equation  +  Assumption: Wind Speed mean = 2m/s #> [1] TRUE library(agroclimR) library(magrittr) library(dplyr) #>  #> Attaching package: 'dplyr' #> The following objects are masked from 'package:stats': #>  #>     filter, lag #> The following objects are masked from 'package:base': #>  #>     intersect, setdiff, setequal, union  soil_sample = group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1)   ## basic example code to create ORYZA soil file  write_soil_oryza(path = ".", id_name, soil_sample, ZRTMS = 0.50, WL0I = 0, WCLI = 'FC' , RIWCLI = 'NO', SATAV = 20) #> [1] TRUE  ## basic example code to create DSSAT soil file  #write_soil_dssat(path = ".", id_name, soil_sample)

title: Compute Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) — ETo_cal
text: Function compute Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) estimates using different methods.

title: Compute Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) — ETo_cal
code: ETo_cal(wth_data, lat, elev, ref_ht = 2, kRs = 0.175, ws_mean = 2)

title: Compute Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) — ETo_cal
text: wth_data data frame containing weather data columns: date, tmax, tmin, rain, rhum, srad, wspd (optional) lat Numeric. Latitude (decimal degrees) elev Numeric. Elevation (meters sea level) ref_ht Numeric. Sensors reference height. kRs Numeric. Hargreaves empirical coefficient, Coastal coefficient ws_mean Numeric. Wind Speed Mean, default = 2 m/s

title: Compute Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) — ETo_cal
text: function returns numeric vector representing ET0 values (mm).

what: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
title: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
text: dataset detailed agronomic general information experimental trials crop modeling. master table workbook proposed agroclimR package.

title: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
code: agro

title: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
text: data.frame 7 rows 14 columns: ID Trial ID - (character). unique identifier trial. Example: "LOC1T1PROJ1". LOC_ID Locality ID - (character). Indicates location trial. Example: "LOC1". PROJECT Project ID - (character). Associates trial specific project. Example: "PROJ1". CULTIVAR Cultivar name - (character). Specifies plant cultivar used trial. Example: "CULTIVAR1". TR_N Treatment number - (character). Example: "T1". LAT Latitude decimal degrees - (numeric). LONG Longitude decimal degrees - (numeric). ALT Elevation meters sea level - (numeric). PDAT Planting date MM/DD/YYYY format - (date). CROP_SYS Crop system - (character). Example: "IRRIGATED-RAINFED". ESTAB Establishment method - (character). Example: "TRANSPLANT-DIRECT-SEED". NPLDS Number plants per square meter - (numeric). Example: number/m². SBDUR Seed-bed duration days - (numeric). TRDAT Transplanting date MM/DD/YYYY format - (date).

title: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
text: General information Agronomic Data dataset encompasses comprehensive agronomic general information specific experimental trials aimed crop modeling, serving master table workbook proposed agroclimR package. provides foundation advanced analyses agricultural research, detailing trial identification, geographic locations, crop varieties, agronomic treatments, pertinent variables.

title: General information and Agronomic Data — agro
code: # Assuming `agro` is your dataset name head(agro) #> # A tibble: 6 × 12 #>   ID         LOC_ID PROJECT CULTIVAR TR_N    LAT  LONG   ALT PDAT       CROP_SYS #>   <chr>      <chr>  <chr>   <chr>    <chr> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <date>     <chr>    #> 1 SDTOS1MAD… SDTO   MADRI   FED2000  S1     3.91 -75.0   415 2013-04-29 IRRIGAT… #> 2 SDTOS1MAD… SDTO   MADRII  FED2000  S1     3.91 -75.0   415 2015-06-05 IRRIGAT… #> 3 SDTOS2MAD… SDTO   MADRI   FED2000  S2     3.91 -75.0   415 2013-12-05 IRRIGAT… #> 4 SDTOS2MAD… SDTO   MADRII  FED2000  S2     3.91 -75.0   415 2015-11-03 IRRIGAT… #> 5 SDTOS3COL  SDTO   COL     FED2000  S3     3.91 -75.0   415 2014-10-07 IRRIGAT… #> 6 SDTOS3MAD… SDTO   MADRI   FED2000  S3     3.91 -75.0   415 2014-02-05 IRRIGAT… #> # ℹ 2 more variables: ESTAB <chr>, NPLDS <dbl>

title: Observed Fertilization Plan Data — fertil
text: dataset detailing fertilization management application data across various experimental trials research agricultural productivity sustainability. includes information trial identification, locality, project IDs, specific details fertilizer applications.

title: Observed Fertilization Plan Data — fertil
code: fertil

title: Observed Fertilization Plan Data — fertil
text: data.frame 37 rows 7 columns: ID Trial ID - (character). Serves unique identifier trial. Example: "LOC1T1PROJ1". LOC_ID Locality ID - (character). Identifies location trial. Example: "LOC1". PROJECT Project ID - (character). Associates trial specific project. Example: "PROJ1". FERT_No Fertilizer application number - (numeric). Indicates sequence number fertilizer application. DDE Days Emergence - (numeric). Specifies number days crop emergence fertilizer applied. N Nitrogen - (numeric). Amount nitrogen applied, kilograms per hectare (kg/ha). P Phosphate - (numeric). Amount phosphate applied, kilograms per hectare (kg/ha). K Potassium - (numeric). Amount potassium applied, kilograms per hectare (kg/ha).

title: Observed Fertilization Plan Data — fertil
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: Observed Fertilization Plan Data — fertil
text: Observed Fertilization Plan Data dataset contains detailed information fertilization management application experimental trial identified ID workbook agroclimR package. designed provide insights nutrient management practices applied across different trials, facilitating research agricultural productivity sustainability.

title: Observed Fertilization Plan Data — fertil
code: # Assuming `fertil` is your dataset name head(fertil) #> # A tibble: 6 × 8 #>   ID           LOC_ID CULTIVAR FERT_No   DDE     N     P     K #>   <chr>        <chr>  <chr>      <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> #> 1 SDTOS1MADRI  SDTO   FED2000        1    10  42    21.5    33 #> 2 SDTOS1MADRI  SDTO   FED2000        2    23  58     1.5    33 #> 3 SDTOS1MADRI  SDTO   FED2000        3    38  56.5   0      30 #> 4 SDTOS1MADRI  SDTO   FED2000        4    52  51.2   0      15 #> 5 SDTOS1MADRI  SDTO   FED2000        5    64  18.4   0       0 #> 6 SDTOS1MADRII SDTO   FED2000        1     9  42    21.5    48

code: import_exp_data(path = ., files, model = "oryza")

title: Import Experimental data from INPUT_data workbook — import_exp_data

title: Observed Plant Phenological Data — phenol
text: dataset containing key phenological dates plant cultivars used crop modeling trials. record details phenological stages rice growth (similar others crops).

title: Observed Plant Phenological Data — phenol
code: phenol

title: Observed Plant Phenological Data — phenol
text: data.frame 7 rows 8 columns: ID Trial ID - (character). Serves unique identifier trial. Example: "LOC1T1PROJ1". LOC_ID Locality ID - (character). Denotes trial's location. Example: "LOC1". CULTIVAR Cultivar name - (character). Identifies cultivar used trial. Example: "CULTIVAR1". EDAT Emergence date - (date). date plants emerged. Format: MM/DD/YYYY. IDAT Panicle initiation date - (date). date panicle initiation observed. Format: MM/DD/YYYY. FDAT Flowering date - (date). date flowering occurred. Format: MM/DD/YYYY. MDAT Maturity date - (date). date plants reached maturity. Format: MM/DD/YYYY.

title: Observed Plant Phenological Data — phenol
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: Observed Plant Phenological Data — phenol
text: Observed Plant Phenological Data dataset encompasses observed plant phenological dates crop modeling trials. provides crucial milestones growth cycle plants (based rice cultivars), including dates emergence, panicle initiation, flowering, maturity. phenological markers essential understanding crop development stages, assessing impact agronomic practices, guiding management decisions rice cultivation.

title: Observed Plant Growth Data — plant
text: comprehensive dataset observed plant growth metrics, including organ biomass dry matter samplings. measurements integral crop modeling physiology studies, offering insights development health different cultivars varying conditions.

title: Observed Plant Growth Data — plant
code: plant

title: Observed Plant Growth Data — plant
text: data.frame 77 rows 22 columns: ID Trial ID - (character). unique identifier trial. Example: "LOC1T1PROJ1". LOC_ID Locality ID - (character). Indicates location trial. Example: "LOC1". PROJECT Project ID - (character). Associates trial specific project. Example: "PROJ1". CULTIVAR Cultivar name - (character). Specifies plant cultivar used trial. Example: "CULTIVAR1". SAMPLING_DATE Sampling date - (date). date plant sampling conducted, MM/DD/YYYY format. LAI_OBS Leaf Area Index observed - (numeric). Measures area leaves per unit area ground, m² leaf/m² ground. LAI_SE Leaf Area Index standard deviation - (numeric). standard deviation Leaf Area Index, m² leaf/m² ground. WLVG_OBS Green leaf dry weight - (numeric). dry weight green leaves, kg/ha. WLVG_SE Green leaf dry weight standard error - (numeric). standard error green leaf dry weight, kg/ha. WLVD_OBS Dead leaf dry weight - (numeric). dry weight dead leaves, kg/ha. WLVD_SE Dead leaf dry weight standard error - (numeric). standard error dead leaf dry weight, kg/ha. WST_OBS Stem dry weight - (numeric). dry weight stems, kg/ha. WST_SE Stem dry weight standard error - (numeric). standard error stem dry weight, kg/ha. WSO_OBS Panicle dry weight - (numeric). dry weight panicles, kg/ha. WSO_SE Panicle dry weight standard error - (numeric). standard error panicle dry weight, kg/ha. WAGT_OBS Total dry weight - (numeric). total plant dry weight, including sampled organs, kg/ha. WAGT_SE Total dry weight standard error - (numeric). standard error total dry weight, kg/ha. NLV_OBS Number green leaves - (numeric). number green leaves per square meter, number/m². NLV_SE Number green leaves standard error - (numeric). standard error number green leaves, number/m². NST_OBS Number stems - (numeric). number stems per square meter, number/m². NST_SE Number stems standard error - (numeric). standard error number stems, number/m². NP_OBS Number panicles - (numeric). number panicles per square meter, number/m². NP_SE Number panicles standard error - (numeric). standard error number panicles, number/m².

title: Observed Plant Growth Data — plant
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: Observed Plant Growth Data — plant
text: Observed Plant Growth Data dataset contains observed plant growth data, including organ biomass dry matter samplings, crucial modeling crop physiology studies. provides detailed view plant growth dynamics across various trials, facilitating analysis crop development, yield potential, effects agronomic treatments plant growth.

title: ) — run_drates_param

title: Observed Soil Data — soil
text: dataset observed soil data providing detailed chemical physical properties soil experimental trials. observations critical crop modeling, allowing -depth analysis soil conditions affect agricultural productivity.

title: Observed Soil Data — soil
code: soil

title: Observed Soil Data — soil
text: data.frame 18 rows 22 columns: NL Number soil layers - (numeric). Indicates maximum layers considered, 10. DEPTH Thickness soil layer - (numeric). Measured centimeters (cm). STC Soil Texture Class (12-USDA) - (character). Represents USDA texture class. SAND Soil sand content - (numeric). Percentage sand content (%). SILT Soil silt content - (numeric). Percentage silt content (%). CLAY Soil clay content - (numeric). Percentage clay content (%). SBDM Soil Bulk Density - (numeric). Measured grams per cubic centimeter (g/cm³). SOC Soil organic carbon - (numeric). Measured grams per kilogram (g/kg). SLON Soil Organic Nitrogen - (numeric). Measured milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg). SNH4 Ammonium (KCl, elemental N) - (numeric). Measured milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg). SNO3 Nitrate (KCl, elemental N) - (numeric). Measured milligrams per kilogram (mg/kg). PH pH - (numeric). measure soil acidity alkalinity. SCEC Cation exchange capacity - (numeric). Measured centimoles per kilogram (cmol/kg). WCST Saturated volumetric water content - (numeric). Percentage water content soil saturated (%). WCFC Volumetric water content field capacity - (numeric). Percentage water content field capacity (%). WCWP Volumetric water content wilting point - (numeric). Percentage water content wilting point (%). WCAD Volumetric water content air dryness - (numeric). Percentage water content soil air dry (%). SSKS Saturated hydraulic conductivity - (numeric). Measured centimeters per hour (cm/h).

title: Observed Soil Data — soil
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: Observed Soil Data — soil
text: Observed Soil Data dataset contains comprehensive chemical physical soil data experimental trials used crop modeling within agroclimR package framework. includes details soil layers, texture, content, vital soil properties, essential understanding soil characteristics influence crop growth development.

title: Observed Weather Data — weather
text: dataset capturing daily weather observations. includes data temperature, precipitation, irradiance, relative humidity, wind speed, collected FEDEARROZ network meteorological stations.

title: Observed Weather Data — weather
code: weather

title: Observed Weather Data — weather
text: data.frame 1461 rows 7 columns: DATE Date observation - (Date). Captures daily dates weather observations. TMAX Maximum temperature observed - (numeric). Values degrees Celsius (oC). TMIN Minimum temperature observed - (numeric). Values degrees Celsius (oC). RAIN Precipitation amount - (numeric). Values millimeters per day (mm d-1). SRAD Solar irradiance - (numeric). Values Megajoules per square meter per day (MJ m-2 d-1). RHUM Relative humidity - (numeric). Percentage values (%). WSPD Wind speed - (numeric). Values meters per second (m/s).

title: Observed Weather Data — weather
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: Observed Weather Data — weather
text: Observed Weather Data dataset encompasses daily observed weather data collected FEDEARROZ network Davis Vantage Pro2 meteorological stations. designed provide researchers practitioners detailed environmental measurements critical agricultural research, weather analysis, climatology studies.

what: Write Aquacrop v6.1 Soil File — write_soil_aquacrop
title: Write Aquacrop v6.1 Soil File — write_soil_aquacrop
text: Function compute Soil information Aquacrop v6.1 soil file.

title: Write Aquacrop v6.1 Soil File — write_soil_aquacrop
code: write_soil_aquacrop(path = ".", id_name, soil_data, model_version = 6.1)

title: Write Aquacrop v6.1 Soil File — write_soil_aquacrop
text: path string indicating path folder working directory id_name String. 4 letters string locality name. (ex. "JR") soil_data Data frame. Soil data. see soil salb Numeric. Albedo, fraction evapL Numeric. Evaporation limit, (mm) slnf Numeric. Mineralization factor, 0 1 scale. slpf Numeric. Photosynthesis factor, 0 1 scale multi Logical. Soil annual average temperature first layers max_depth description

title: Write Aquacrop v6.1 Soil File — write_soil_aquacrop
text: function returns logical files created path folder.

title: Write Aquacrop v6.1 Soil File — write_soil_aquacrop
code: # Write Aquacrop v6 Soil file soil_sample = group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1) #> Error in group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1): could not find function "%>%" write_soil_aquacrop(path = ".", id_name = "test_soil", soil_data = soil_sample) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'soil_sample' not found

what: Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil File — write_soil_dssat
title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil File — write_soil_dssat
text: Function compute Soil information DSSAT v4.8 soil file.

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil File — write_soil_dssat
code: write_soil_dssat(   path = ".",   id_name,   soil_data,   salb = 0.13,   evapL = 6,   sldr = 0.6,   slnf = 1,   slpf = 1,   multi = F )

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil File — write_soil_dssat
text: path string indicating path folder working directory id_name String. 4 letters string locality name. (ex. "JR") soil_data Data frame. Soil data. see soil salb Numeric. Albedo, fraction evapL Numeric. Evaporation limit, (mm) slnf Numeric. Mineralization factor, 0 1 scale. slpf Numeric. Photosynthesis factor, 0 1 scale multi Logical. soil profiles file max_depth description

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil File — write_soil_dssat
text: function returns logical files created path folder.

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil File — write_soil_dssat
code: # Write DSSAT v4.8 Soil file soil = group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1) #> Error in group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1): could not find function "%>%" write_soil_dssat(id_name = "test_soil", soil_data = soil) #> Minimun data are available

what: Write ORYZA v3 Soil File — write_soil_oryza
title: Write ORYZA v3 Soil File — write_soil_oryza
text: Function compute Soil information ORYZA soil file.

title: Write ORYZA v3 Soil File — write_soil_oryza
code: write_soil_oryza(   path = ".",   id_name,   soil_data,   ZRTMS = 0.5,   WL0I = 0,   WCLI = "FC",   RIWCLI = "NO",   SATAV = 20 )

title: Write ORYZA v3 Soil File — write_soil_oryza
text: path string indicating path folder working directory id_name String 4 letters string locality name. "AIHU" = Aipe, Huila soil_data Data frame. Soil data. see soil ZRTMS Numeric. Maximum rooting depth soil (m) WL0I Numeric. Initial pounded water depth start simulation (mm) WCLI Numeric/String. WCLI can take 3 values: Field Capacity ('FC'), 50% Soil Saturation ('ST50'), Fraction water content ('0.0'- '1.0') RIWCLI String. Re-initialize switch RIWCLI ('YES') ('') SATAV Numeric. Soil annual average temperature first layers

title: Write ORYZA v3 Soil File — write_soil_oryza
text: function returns logical files created path folder.

title: Write ORYZA v3 Soil File — write_soil_oryza
code: # Write ORYZA Soil file soil_sample = group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1) #> Error in group_by(soil, NL) %>% sample_n(1): could not find function "%>%" write_soil_oryza(id_name = "test_soil", soil_data = soil_sample) #> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'soil_sample' not found

title: Write AquaCrop Weather File — write_wth_aquacrop
text: Function compute weather information AquaCrop v6.0 weather file.

title: Write AquaCrop Weather File — write_wth_aquacrop
code: write_wth_aquacrop(   path = ".",   id_name,   wth_data,   lat,   lon,   elev,   co2_file = "MaunaLoa.CO2",   ... )

title: Write AquaCrop Weather File — write_wth_aquacrop
text: path string indicating path folder working directory weather files saved. id_name 4-letter string representing locality name abbreviation. example, "AIHU" stands Aipe, Huila. wth_data data frame containing weather data least following columns: date, tmax, tmin, rain. lat Numeric. Latitude location decimal degrees. lon Numeric. Longitude location decimal degrees. elev Numeric. Elevation location meters sea level. co2_file string representing CO2 file used. Default "MaunaLoa.CO2". CO2 files available Aquacrop default database.

title: Write AquaCrop Weather File — write_wth_aquacrop
text: function returns logical value indicating whether files successfully created specified path folder.

title: Write AquaCrop Weather File — write_wth_aquacrop
code: # Write AquaCrop weather file write_wth_aquacrop(   path = ".", id_name = "TEST", wth_data = weather,   lat = 3.8, lon = -76.5, elev = 650) #> Wind Speed = 2m/s was used #> Reference evapotranspiration (ETo) Method: FAO Penman-Monteith equation  +  Assumption: Wind Speed mean = 2m/s #> [1] TRUE

what: Write DSSAT v4.8 Weather File — write_wth_dssat
title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Weather File — write_wth_dssat
text: Function compute weather information DSSAT v4.8 weather file.

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Weather File — write_wth_dssat
code: write_wth_dssat(path = ".", id_name, wth_data, lat, lon, elev, ref_ht = 2)

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Weather File — write_wth_dssat
text: path string indicating path folder working directory id_name String 4 letters string locality name. "AIHU" = Aipe, Huila wth_data Data frame Weather data. minimum = date, tmax, tmin, rain lat Numeric. Latitude (decimal degrees) lon Numeric. Longitude (decimal degrees) elev Numeric. Elevation (meters sea level) ref_ht Numeric. Reference height (meters)- weather station

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Weather File — write_wth_dssat
text: function returns logical files created path folder.

title: Write DSSAT v4.8 Weather File — write_wth_dssat
code: # Write file write_wth_dssat(   path = ".", id_name = "TEST", wth_data = weather,   lat = 3.91, lon = -75.0, elev = 450) #> [1] TRUE

what: Write ORYZA v3 Weather File — write_wth_oryza
title: Write ORYZA v3 Weather File — write_wth_oryza
text: Function compute weather information ORYZA weather file.

title: Write ORYZA v3 Weather File — write_wth_oryza
code: write_wth_oryza(   path = ".",   id_name,   wth_data,   lat,   lon,   elev,   stn = 1,   multiyear = F,   tag = F )

title: Write ORYZA v3 Weather File — write_wth_oryza
text: path string indicating path folder working directory id_name String 4 letters string locality name. "AIHU" = Aipe, Huila wth_data Data frame Weather data. minimum = date, tmax, tmin, rain lat Numeric. Latitude (decimal degrees) lon Numeric. Longitude (decimal degrees) elev Numeric. Elevation (meters sea level) stn Integer. Station number multiyear Logical. TRUE = ".cli" multiyear format FALSE = yearly format (ie. 1998 = *.998) tag Logical. TRUE = write information file

title: Write ORYZA v3 Weather File — write_wth_oryza
text: function returns logical files created path folder.

title: Write ORYZA v3 Weather File — write_wth_oryza
code: # Write file write_wth_oryza(   path = ".", id_name = "TEST", wth_data = weather,   lat = 3.8, lon = -76.5, elev = 650) #> Early morning vapor pressure (VP; kPa) derived from relative humidity data #> Wind Speed is not Available - Set as NA: -99 #> [1] TRUE  write_wth_oryza(   path = ".", id_name = "TEST2", wth_data = weather,   lat = 3.8, lon = -76.5, elev = 650, multiyear = T, tag = T) #> Early morning vapor pressure (VP; kPa) derived from relative humidity data #> Wind Speed is not Available - Set as NA: -99 #> [1] TRUE

title: Observed Grain Yield Data — yield
text: dataset capturing detailed grain yield yield components experimental trials. observations critical evaluating effectiveness cultivation practices genetic performance across different rice cultivars.

title: Observed Grain Yield Data — yield
code: yield

title: Observed Grain Yield Data — yield
text: data.frame 7 rows 20 columns: ID Trial ID - (character). Uniquely identifies trial. Example: "LOC1T1PROJ1". LOC_ID Locality ID - (character). Denotes trial's location. Example: "LOC1". CULTIVAR Cultivar name - (character). Identifies cultivar used trial. Example: "CULTIVAR1". YIELD_AVG Yield average - (numeric). average yield, measured kilograms per hectare (kg/ha). YIELD_MIN Yield minimum - (numeric). minimum observed yield, kg/ha. YIELD_MAX Yield maximum - (numeric). maximum observed yield, kg/ha. HIAM Harvest index maturity - (numeric). ratio grain yield total biomass maturity. HIAM_SE Harvest index maturity standard error - (numeric). Standard error harvest index maturity. PAN_fert Panicle fertility - (numeric). Percentage fertile panicles (%). PAN_fert_SE Panicle fertility standard error - (numeric). Standard error panicle fertility percentage (%). GW1000 1000-Grain weight - (numeric). Weight 1000 grains, measured grams (g). GW1000_SE 1000-Grain weight standard error - (numeric). Standard error 1000-grain weight (g). ST_M2 Number stems per square meter - (numeric). density stems, number/m². ST_M2_SE Number stems per square meter standard error - (numeric). Standard error stem density (number/m²). PAN_M2 Number panicles per square meter - (numeric). density panicles, number/m². PAN_M2_SE Number panicles per square meter standard error - (numeric). Standard error panicle density (number/m²). GT_PAN Number total grains per panicle - (numeric). Total number grains per panicle. GT_PAN_SE Number total grains per panicle standard error - (numeric). Standard error total grains per panicle. GF_PAN Number filled grains per panicle - (numeric). Number filled grains per panicle. GF_PAN_SE Number filled grains per panicle standard error - (numeric). Standard error filled grains per panicle.

title: Observed Grain Yield Data — yield
text: Rodriguez-Espinoza J, (2024) CIAT-MADR-FEDEARROZ, (2016)

title: Observed Grain Yield Data — yield
text: Observed Grain Yield Data dataset presents observed grain yield yield components data crop modeling experimental trials. includes detailed measurements yield averages, minimum maximum yields, harvest index, panicle fertility, grain weight, vital yield components. comprehensive data essential analyzing performance different cultivars various agronomic practices environmental conditions, facilitating advancements crop yield optimization.
